New Records: Armenia secured a 4-1 victory over Latvia, marking a significant win margin in the match.
Key Match Events: Vahan Bichakhchyan scored Armenia's first goal in the 6th minute with a left-footed shot.
Georgi Harutyunyan scored an own goal in the 9th minute, leveling the score.
Kaspars Dubra scored an own goal for Latvia in the 35th minute.

Eduard Spertsyan sealed the victory with the fourth goal in the 86th minute.
